sub_fields.label: Box Internal Alignment
sub_fields.name: box_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: Alignment for the interior of individual boxes

sub_fields.label: Add overlay?
sub_fields.name: icon_box_overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Only works if image as a background is chosen.

sub_fields.label: Overlay colour
sub_fields.name: icon_box_overlay_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Sits above the image between the text

sub_fields.label: Image Options
sub_fields.name: card_post_image
sub_fields.instructions: Where should the image be sourced from?

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: card_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Add Fontawesome class, not including prefix

sub_fields.label: Add title and/or subtitle over image?
sub_fields.name: card_title_position

sub_fields.label: Sub Title
sub_fields.name: card_sub_title
sub_fields.instructions: Used in conjunction with background image blocks

sub_fields.label: Tab Content Icon
sub_fields.name: tab_content_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Add the full code for a FontAwesome 5 icon (including the i element tag)

sub_fields.label: Tab Area Padding
sub_fields.name: tab_box
sub_fields.instructions: This controls padding around the tab area, not the intro area above.

sub_fields.label: Testimonial device
sub_fields.name: testimonial_device
sub_fields.instructions: This should be an SVG, and we need to work out what how path and stroke colours are set.

sub_fields.label: Video ID
sub_fields.name: embed_video_id
sub_fields.instructions: The video ID of the YouTube or Vimeo video you want to embed (not the full URL)

sub_fields.label: Get latest posts from these categories:
sub_fields.name: block_get_latest_posts
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the category or categories of posts you want to retrieve the latest posts from

sub_fields.label: How many latest or featured posts to retrieve?
sub_fields.name: block_category_posts_num

choices.vertical: Image block with title & intro, vertical
choices.horizontal: Image block with title & intro, horizontal
choices.text: Text block with title and intro, no image
